lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton made a brief, private appearance Friday at publishing's annual national convention, BookExpo America, and offered booksellers a few details about her upcoming memoir, "Hard Choices."

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Makes Brief Appearance at BookExpo
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton Makes Brief Appearance at BookExpo
